description: Amendment of existing consent (ref: 98/1241) involving general internal layout amendments; enclosure of rear yards for units 1-3; extra bedroom and concealed roof terrace for unit 4 and access to roof terraces for units 2 & 3. APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  1421/07/D, 1660-0107A, 1660-0-106A, 1660-0-104A, 1660-0-103A, 1660-0-102A, 1660-0-101A, 1660-0-100A, 1660/0/106B, 1660/setting out/A and 1660/0/121.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The construction of units 4-9 (as so numbered on drawing 1660/0/100) shall be completed in all respects in accordance with the drawings hereby approved and in particular with regard to: 

 i) the arrangements shown on drawing 1660/0/121; and ii) a minimum distance of 18 metres between the rear bay windows of 13-23 Cruden Street and the first floor windows of units 4-9 inclusive (as specified on drawing 1660/ setting out). 

 REASON: In order to protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers.
